title: Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.
description: Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.
OB: select the XML file, the file relative path should be used.Actual result:only the absolute path is supported.Expect result:the relative and absolute path are supported.
